lokalise.label: Lokalise
lokalise.pullCommand: pnpm exec lokalise2 file download --token "$LOKALISE_TOKEN" --project-id "$LOKALISE_PROJECT" --format json --original-filenames true --unzip-to _locales
lokalise.notes: Requires lokalise2 CLI + read-only API token

smartling.label: Smartling
smartling.pullCommand: pnpm exec smartling files download --config smartling.yml
